title: * bugfix for a rare network-on-main exception
message:
* bugfix for a rare network-on-main exception
* bugfix for the latest android versions with device-default themes (options in dropdown lists would appear with white text on white background)
* changed script "Get" destination to scroll directly to the user scripts on the Pardus download page

title: * added support for recent Pardus features (configurable amount of…
message:
* added support for recent Pardus features (configurable amount of horizontal/vertical tiles on the Nav screen, MO log notification)
* on the first run after installing the app the width/height of Nav in tiles is calculated and set depending on the display size
* disabled the new dynamic Nav size feature (= automatic Nav size change on browser resize events) by cookie due to bugs when zooming using the app
* replaced the broken Userscripts link with greasyfork.org

title: * bugfix for android version 4.4: webviews in android 4.4 are based on chromium…
message: * bugfix for android version 4.4: webviews in android 4.4 are based on chromium and do not allow access to file and content URLs from remote pages anymore -> local image packs do not work. this change simply makes the app on android versions 4.4+ use the online image pack configured in the user's account settings on pardus.at.

title: * added a daily check to see if an update of the image pack in use is available,…
message:
* added a daily check to see if an update of the image pack in use is available, prompting the user to download an incremental update if available (works only with image packs downloaded on or after may 20th)
* switched from the solarix IP to the more recent xolarix IP in the image pack selection
* includes the latest webview-gm library (Fixes issue 002)
* several small changes to fix or remove invalid lint markers

title: * bugfix to not scroll back to 0/0 when loading forum threads or URLs containing a hash character
message: * bugfix to not scroll back to 0/0 when loading forum threads or URLs containing a hash character

title: * bugfix for devices missing a physical menu button
message:
* bugfix for devices missing a physical menu button
* more menu items in the action bar (if available)
* attempt at increasing the maximum level zooming out is possible (not working in android versions 3 and 4.1)
* various minor improvements

title: * switched to build-sdk 13 (android 3.2) to fix a regression regarding screen…
message:
* switched to build-sdk 13 (android 3.2) to fix a regression regarding screen orientation changes in android 3.2+
* now storing one page property (zoom, scroll) per url and screen orientation
* added code to hide the automatic "double-tap to zoom" tips despite not having such functionality

title: * fixed a bug in removeTraces
message: * fixed a bug in removeTraces

title: * fixed zoom level and scroll position remembering feature
message: * fixed zoom level and scroll position remembering feature

title: * added feature to remember scroll position and zoom level of visited pages…
message:
* added feature to remember scroll position and zoom level of visited pages (working on emulators, but buggy on a v2.3 test phone -> NOT READY FOR RELEASE)
* added option (default on) to remove zoom buttons if the phone supports multi-touch
* added option to disable fullscreen mode
* following external (non-Pardus) links now opens the default browser (previously ignored)
* switched to target SDK 16 (v4.1)
* optimizations for tablets
* faster notification of new (system) messages and logs
* fixed a rare crash during app pause/resume (NetworkOnMainThreadException)

title: * fixed crash on copy&paste on some devices
message:
* fixed crash on copy&paste on some devices
* fixed error when setting nav size
* for security reasons the app's javascript interfaces (settings, links, utils) are made inaccessible before the execution of user scripts

title: * experimental greasemonkey support added (through the WebView-GM library, to be…
message:
* experimental greasemonkey support added (through the WebView-GM library, to be published within the next days)
* supports the most used GM functions: GM_getValue, GM_setValue, GM_listValues, GM_deleteValue, GM_addStyle, GM_log
* supports unsafeWindow and the parsing of the metadata block
* support missing (in order of importance): GM_xmlhttpRequest, metadata block usage of @require and @resource, GM_getResourceText, GM_getResourceURL, GM_registerMenuCommand, GM_openInTab, GM_info
* messages have been moved to the left due to the interference of the zoom controls

title: * added menu bar sensitivity setting (= amount of pixels to scroll over the…
message:
* added menu bar sensitivity setting (= amount of pixels to scroll over the border to fade in the menu bar): options ranging from 0 to 80dp and "never show by scrolling"
* default sensitivity is 32dp as opposed to 16px in the previous version
* fixed bulletin board mission accept bug

title: * removed the two top frames (menu and message notification) to gain more space…
message:
* removed the two top frames (menu and message notification) to gain more space and to get rid of the TODOs and FIXMEs
* added floating menu with Pardus links, accessed by scrolling against the top or bottom of a page or by using the app's menu
* links in the new menu can be customized (added/edited/removed)
* notifications about status messages, new PMs/AMs and logs are now displayed in the bottom right corner of the screen (updated by a background thread running once per minute)
* enabled the copy part of copy&paste (long-press) for android versions 2.3 and below (higher versions have native support)
* added a popup with new version infos to be shown at the first start after an update
* improved the appearance of local pages on tablet resolutions (sizes in dp/sp instead of density dependent px)
* "switch to universe" menu items are only shown if a character exists in the corresponding universe
* added menu link for the account_play page and moved ingame links to the new floating menu
* fixed the loading progress bar
* removed the webview's extra right-border padding
* removed the about page
* added a new "what is pardus" button to the login page

title: * the WebView component in Android3+ stopped loading local URLs if they…
message:
* the WebView component in Android3+ stopped loading local URLs if they contained parameters => added javascript workaround
* fixed "clear cache" function to successfully delete any stored form fields (user/password)
* added icon for xhdpi resolutions

title: * removed compatibility code for versions <= 2.1
message:
* removed compatibility code for versions <= 2.1
* added proguard build optimizations

title: * creation of .nomedia file in image pack directory to exclude it from android's gallery
message:
* creation of .nomedia file in image pack directory to exclude it from android's gallery
* option to limit amount of loaded chat lines to 10 (default on)
* new menu buttons to switch universe

title: * removed the application's title bar
message:
* removed the application's title bar
* added a thin progress bar at the bottom of the screen, showing only during page loads

title: * added new options: partial refresh (default on), ship animation (default off),…
message: * added new options: partial refresh (default on), ship animation (default off), ship rotation (default on)

title: * previously hard-coded options now configurable through settings screen (use…
message:
* previously hard-coded options now configurable through settings screen (use https, log out on hide, nav space chart size)
* stopping as many of the webview's tasks as possible when pausing/hiding the app (restarting them on resume)
* access to the online login page always redirected to the local one

title: * bugfix: menu not working when character auto-login is selected
message: * bugfix: menu not working when character auto-login is selected

title: * bugfix: detect logged in status when character auto-login is selected
message:
* bugfix: detect logged in status when character auto-login is selected
* added signup link for new players from google market

title: * first import of the pardus-android project
message:
* first import of the pardus-android project
* includes SslError and WebViewClient of the android sdk core so ssl errors can be caught with devices running android 2.1 or lower
